ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.6.* *_cpython
zip_keys:
- - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.description:
A compilation-free, always up-to-date encryption library for Python
that works on Windows, OS X, Linux and BSD.
Supports the following versions of
Python: 2.6, 2.7, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, 3.7, 3.8 and pypy.
about.summary: Compiler-free Python crypto library backed by the OS, supporting CPython and PyPy

about.description:
A compilation-free, always up-to-date encryption library for Python
that works on Windows, OS X, Linux and BSD.
Supports the following versions of
Python: 2.6, 2.7, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, 3.7, 3.8 and pypy.
about.summary: Compiler-free Python crypto library backed by the OS, supporting CPython and PyPy

name: oscrypto
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "oscrypto" %}
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7d2cca6235d89d1af6eb9cfcd4d2c0cb405849868157b2f7b278beb644d48694

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - asn1crypto >=1.0.0

test:
  requires:
    - pip
  imports:
    - oscrypto
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/wbond/oscrypto
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Compiler-free Python crypto library backed by the OS, supporting CPython and PyPy

  description: |
    A compilation-free, always up-to-date encryption library for Python
    that works on Windows, OS X, Linux and BSD.
    Supports the following versions of
    Python: 2.6, 2.7, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, 3.7, 3.8 and pypy.
  doc_url: https://github.com/wbond/oscrypto/blob/master/docs/readme.md
  dev_url: https://github.com/wbond/oscrypto

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - talues
